title: Wizard Academy Exam Adventure #2
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Exam Preparation Room
rooms.description: A cozy study room filled with floating candles and shelves of spell components. Magical runes glow softly on the stone walls. A large wooden desk sits in the center, covered with parchments and quills. Through the window, you can see the academy's towers reaching toward the starry sky. This is where students prepare for their final wizard examination.

items.name: enchanted wooden desk
items.description: A sturdy oak desk with three drawers, each marked with a different magical symbol

items.name: letter from Headmaster Aldric
items.description: A formal letter sealed with the academy's crest
items.text: Dear Student, your final examination awaits. Remember the sacred number of our academy: seven times seven times seven equals 777. This number has protected our school for centuries. You are Apprentice Elara Moonwhisper, and you must prove your worth. Good luck! - Headmaster Aldric

items.name: tall bookshelf
items.description: A bookshelf filled with ancient tomes and magical texts

items.name: book of spell theory
items.description: A leather-bound textbook with gold lettering
items.text: Chapter 7: The Three Pillars of Magic. All spells require three components: Intent (the wizard's will), Focus (the wand or staff), and Power (magical energy from the Crystal Sanctum). Master these, and you shall pass any examination.

items.name: ornate spell chest
items.description: A beautiful chest decorated with silver stars and moons

items.name: silver wand shaped key
items.description: A small key carved to look like a miniature wand

items.name: apprentice wand
items.description: A slender wand made of willow wood with a crystal core, required for the examination

items.name: carved library door
items.description: A heavy wooden door carved with images of spell books and scrolls. It leads to the Spell Library.

rooms.name: Spell Library
rooms.description: A magnificent library with towering shelves that reach up into darkness. Books float through the air, organizing themselves. Magical portraits of famous wizards line the walls, their eyes seeming to follow you. A grand archway to the east leads to the examination hall. Crystal orbs provide soft, colorful light throughout the space.

items.name: portrait of Archmage Merlin
items.description: A painting of a wise wizard with a long white beard
items.text: Archmage Merlin - Founder of the Academy. Known for teaching that Intent is the first pillar of all magic. His wisdom guides us still.

items.name: portrait of Sorceress Morgana
items.description: A painting of an elegant woman holding a staff
items.text: Sorceress Morgana - Master of Enchantments. She discovered that magical Power flows from the Crystal Sanctum deep beneath the academy.

items.name: portrait of Wizard Gandalf
items.description: A painting of a stern wizard in grey robes
items.text: Wizard Gandalf - Guardian of Knowledge. He taught that Focus through one's wand is essential for channeling magic properly.

items.name: ancient reading table
items.description: A table covered with open books and scrolls

items.name: academy history scroll
items.description: A scroll detailing the history of the wizard academy
items.text: The Academy was founded in the Age of Magic by Archmage Merlin. Students who complete their training earn the title of Wizard. The final examination tests knowledge, skill, and character. Only those who know themselves and the three pillars of magic may enter the Grand Examination Hall.

items.name: cluster of floating books
items.description: Several books hovering in mid-air, glowing with magical energy

items.name: glowing crystal orb
items.description: A magical orb that pulses with inner light, one of the artifacts needed for the examination

items.name: grand examination archway
items.description: A magnificent stone archway inscribed with three questions. Only those who answer correctly may pass to take their final exam.

password_questions.question: What is the first pillar of magic?
password_questions.hint: Check Archmage Merlin's portrait for information about the pillars

password_questions.question: Where does magical power flow from?
password_questions.hint: Sorceress Morgana's portrait mentions the source of power

password_questions.question: What is your name, apprentice?
password_questions.hint: The Headmaster's letter addresses you by name

rooms.name: Grand Examination Hall
rooms.description: You have reached the Grand Examination Hall! A vast circular chamber with a domed ceiling showing constellations that move and shimmer. In the center stands a pedestal holding the Tome of Mastery. Magical energy swirls around you. The Headmaster's voice echoes: 'You have proven yourself worthy. Take the tome and claim your title as a true wizard!'

items.name: Tome of Mastery
items.description: An ancient book bound in dragon leather, glowing with powerful magic. This tome grants the title of Wizard to those who complete the examination.

items.name: crystal pedestal
items.description: A pedestal made of pure crystal, holding the legendary Tome of Mastery

items.name: magical constellation ceiling
items.description: The domed ceiling displays moving stars and constellations
items.text: The constellations spell out a message: 'Knowledge, Courage, and Wisdom - these are the marks of a true wizard. You have demonstrated all three. Congratulations, Wizard Elara Moonwhisper.'

rooms.win_message: Congratulations! You have passed the final examination and earned the title of Wizard! As you touch the Tome of Mastery, magical energy flows through you, and your apprentice wand transforms into a true wizard's staff. The academy's bells ring out in celebration. You are now Wizard Elara Moonwhisper, graduate of the Academy of Magic. You win!
